review: This thing is awesome. Believe it or not, having this alongside a ChromeCast gives you more choices due to Amazon Prime Instant Video. I've been able to watch some series on here, others on Netflix...etc. It's quick, has a nice interface, and the fast forward / rewind feature is very useful and intuitive. We have 2 of these in our house now, and it's also perfect to quickly stream Thomas the Train for my son to keep him happy!
